description: This file defines a React functional component 'HelloWorld' used in a Remotion video project. It includes imports from Remotion, custom components, and schema validation with zod. The component creates an animated scene with logo and text elements.

methods.name: HelloWorld
methods.description: React functional component that renders an animated scene with a logo, title, and subtitle using Remotion. It handles animations for movement and opacity based on the current frame.
